Class Boid

  • java.lang.Object
    • Boid

  • public class Boid
extends java.lang.Object

    Boid

    This class represents a 2D boid.
    Since:
    13-04-2015

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Boid(double xPos, double yPos)
      Constructor which takes two doubles as position for the boid, instantiates its vectors and its array list of near boids

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void calculateNearBoids(java.util.ArrayList<Boid> boidList)
      Calculates which boids in the boidList are presently within the neighbourhood, adds them to the nearBoids array list.
      void calculateNewPosition()
      Calculate new position of boid from current position and velocity vector
      void calculateNewPositionInfiniteSandbox(double worldSizeX, double worldSizeY)
      Calculate new position of boid while implementing "infinite sandbox mode": Borders are connected
      void calculateVelocity()
      Calculate the velocity of the boid by calculating the rules separately, adding them to the current velocity and finally limiting the length of the vectors
      void drawBoid(java.awt.Graphics myGraphicsObject)
      Draw function of the boid.
      Coordinate getCoordinate()
      Returns the boids coordinate
      Vector2D getVelocity()
      Returns the boids velocity vector
      void setInfluenceAlignment(int influenceAlignmentSlider)
      Sets the influence of alignment
      void setInfluenceCohesion(int influenceCohesionSlider)
      Sets the influence of cohesion
      void setInfluenceSeparation(int influenceSeparationSlider)
      Sets the influence of separation

      • Boid

        public Boid(double xPos,
    double yPos)
        Constructor which takes two doubles as position for the boid, instantiates its vectors and its array list of near boids
        Parameters:
        xPos - Used as x part of position
        yPos - Used as y part of position

    • Method Detail

      • drawBoid

        public void drawBoid(java.awt.Graphics myGraphicsObject)
        Draw function of the boid. Draws the boid by a filled polygon
        Parameters:
        myGraphicsObject - A graphics object

      • calculateNearBoids

        public void calculateNearBoids(java.util.ArrayList<Boid> boidList)
        Calculates which boids in the boidList are presently within the neighbourhood, adds them to the nearBoids array list.
        Parameters:
        boidList - The array list of all the boids

      • calculateNewPosition

        public void calculateNewPosition()
        Calculate new position of boid from current position and velocity vector

      • calculateNewPositionInfiniteSandbox

        public void calculateNewPositionInfiniteSandbox(double worldSizeX,
                                       double worldSizeY)
        Calculate new position of boid while implementing "infinite sandbox mode": Borders are connected
        Parameters:
        worldSizeX - Size of world in x-direction
        worldSizeY - Size of world in y-direction

      • calculateVelocity

        public void calculateVelocity()
        Calculate the velocity of the boid by calculating the rules separately, adding them to the current velocity and finally limiting the length of the vectors

      • getCoordinate

        public Coordinate getCoordinate()
        Returns the boids coordinate
        Returns:
        The boids coordinate

      • getVelocity

        public Vector2D getVelocity()
        Returns the boids velocity vector
        Returns:
        The boids velocity vector

      • setInfluenceSeparation

        public void setInfluenceSeparation(int influenceSeparationSlider)
        Sets the influence of separation
        Parameters:
        influenceSeparationSlider - Influence of separation, a value of 100 is equal to 1 times the weight of the rule

      • setInfluenceAlignment

        public void setInfluenceAlignment(int influenceAlignmentSlider)
        Sets the influence of alignment
        Parameters:
        influenceAlignmentSlider - Influence of alignment, a value of 100 is equal to 1 times the weight of the rule

      • setInfluenceCohesion

        public void setInfluenceCohesion(int influenceCohesionSlider)
        Sets the influence of cohesion
        Parameters:
        influenceCohesionSlider - Influence of cohesion, a value of 100 is equal to 1 times the weight of the rule
